channel.title: Project Draconian
channel.description:
[center] [size=15pt]-------HELP WANTED------[/size]
[size=15pt]If you want link to forums PM me or REPLY[/size] my msn is rico760@live.com
[size=15pt]Jobs Available:[/size]
Hoster (1) Forums Mod (1) Server Mod (3) Server Admin (2) Server Tester(2) Client Coder(1) Regular Members(just register no need to post application;))
Fill this out:
[code]Age Job E-mail Name Experience(Needed) Proof(Needed): Other Info:[/code]
Proof is needed without proof you'll get declined no matter what the other stuff says. Experience is also needed without that also you'll get declined.
Info: As a hoster you will need to hold up to 30+ people without lagging till at least 40.Also be close to 24-7 (NOTE:hoster will only have to host till i can figure out my dumb router)
As Forums Mod you must be active but not as much as an administrator.
As Forums Admin you must be active at least 5+ hours if not more.
Server Mod must be active if there are no admins available(depending how long and when the server is up provided by the hoster)
Server Admins must always be online if owner or co-owner aren't online(depending how long and when the server is up provided by the hoster)
Staff me Superagend50 (forum mod) [/center]
